<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Xiuh Couatl](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1105)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Fiercer than other couatls, xiuh couatls (pronounced “shoo”) are dedicated to seeking out malevolent creatures and offering a final opportunity at redemption.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 35

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Couatl_XiuhCouatl.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Xiuh Couatl](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1105)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Couatl" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=298" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +23; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), thoughtsense (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +26, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +23, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +23, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Thoughtsense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The xiuh couatl senses all non-[mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creatures at the listed range.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +25 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 220

**Immunities**
electricity, fire

**Weaknesses**
cold 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +25 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+10 piercing plus 2d8 fire, xiuh couatl venom, and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 32, attack +24
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only; at will)
- **6th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Clairaudience](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will), [Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Zone of Truth](/Spells.aspx?ID=379)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self only)

**Rituals** DC 32

- **4th**
[Atone](/Rituals.aspx?ID=2)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The xiuh couatl breaths a gout of flame and lightning in an 80-foot line that deals 5d8 electricity damage and 5d8 fire damage (DC 32 basic Reflex save). The xiuh couatl can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**[Greater Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=19)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d10+10 bludgeoning plus 1d8 electricity, DC 32

**Instrument of Retribution** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The xiuh couatl transforms into any simple or martial weapon. The weapon is always a _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) weapon_ and can be of any size, chosen by the xiuh couatl when they transform. In weapon form, the xiuh couatl gains Hardness equal to that of the weapon into which they transform, and they retain their Hit Points, saving throws, senses, telepathy, and traits while in weapon form. The xiuh couatl can revert to their normal form by spending a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

**Wrap in Coils** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The xiuh couatl has a Medium or smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in their jaws; **Effect** The xiuh couatl moves the creature into their coils, freeing their jaws to make attacks, then uses Constrict against the creature. The xiuh couatl can hold as many creatures in their coils as will fit in their space.

**Xiuh Couatl Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A xiuh couatl's poison deals good damage rather than poison damage to [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70); **Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d8 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d10 poison damage, enfeebled 1, and –5-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d8 poison damage, enfeebled 2, and –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 round)

</column>
